projectName: Gastown UI - Critical Fixes from Review
projectDescription: Fix identified gaps from Phase 1 implementation: error handling, form validation, loading states, testing verification

userStories.title: Integrate ErrorState Component to Mail Page
userStories.scope: Wire ErrorState component to Mail page data fetch. Show error state when email fetch fails, provide retry button.
acceptanceCriteria: Mail page has try-catch around fetchMail()
ErrorState component displays on fetch failure
Error state properly cleared on successful retry
Verified: Disable network, refresh page, see ErrorState appear
testCommands: Navigate to Mail page, open DevTools Network tab, set offline
Refresh page - ErrorState should appear with retry button

userStories.title: Integrate ErrorState Component to Work Page

Verified: Both load failure and form error states work
testCommands: Test form submission to invalid endpoint (submit error)

Verified: Try submitting empty form - validation shows

Fill all fields - submit button enables
